summary: Curve Resources - Explore the world of Curve, a leading decentralized exchange and automated market maker on Ethereum and EVM-compatible chains, known for its advanced stablecoin trading capabilities. This documentation provides a clear overview of Curve's diverse features and functionalities. Learn about the different versions of Curve pools, including v1 and v2, gain insights into the CRV token, and understand the innovative crvUSD stablecoin and new lending platform.
